From: Cisco IOS Configuration Fundamentals Command Reference
FuncDef: To optimize the compilation of a regular expression access list, use the **regexp optimize** command in global configuration mode. To disable the configuration, use the **no** form of this command.

ParaDef.Info: This commmand has no arguments or keywords.

Examples: The following example shows how to optimize the compilation of regular expression access list:

RelatedCmds.description: Creates an entry in a cache profile group that allows authentication and authorization matches based on a regular expression.
